body:
Hello, im Rowmen and I played this server for almost 2 years. I've been playing pvp for 3 years, and competitive pvp for 2 years (Potpvp). In the times of kohi I was very active in game (1500ELO), now Im a little bit bored of the game but Im happy. Actually when i play minecraft Im in Avicus or in Gamesmadeinpola. I would enter one day to a team but the problem is that im not very active and i don't have microphone.
See you in the server <3.


More information about me: 

Real Name: Román
Age: 16
Country: Spain
City: Barcelona
Sex: Man
Occupations: Go out with friend
Favorite sports: Ski, surf, football


More information about me in the game:

Time playing mc: 3/4 years
Favorite modalities: Pot Pvp, Soup Pvp, OCN.
Favorite servers ever: Kohi, Avicus, GamesMadeInPola
